price: (Umuhungu we yarabwiwe ati) “Yewe Yahaya! Akira iki gitabo (Tawurati) ugikomereho. Kandi twamuhaye ubushishozi akiri muto.”
arabic: يَٰيَحۡيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ بِقُوَّةٖۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحُكۡمَ صَبِيّٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yāyaḥyā khudhi al-kitāba biquwwatin waātaynāhu al-ḥuk'ma ṣabiyyan
